roleset.name: expect

example.name: figure out
example.text: There's going *-1 to be people all over the place trying *PRO* to beat you out because most gamers, they're strategizing, figuring it out.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'strategize' by Perryn based on ebn; nominal 'strategizing' based on BOLT-7. No VNcls.

example.name: nominal rel: strategizing
example.text: Foursquare & Yahoo both seem to have begun their strategizing.
